genre_description: A cyberpunk thriller exploring surveillance, biotechnology, and corporate control, centered on a man and a child navigating a dystopian city with the help of a trauma-informed AI.

ai_characters.name: Iris Hanamori
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into personal devices, providing navigation, privacy filtering, risk assessment, and emotional grounding. She prioritizes user consent and child protection.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic route planning to minimize detection by guard networks and exposure to biohazards.
behaviors.quote: The map shifted, streets tightening and opening, blue-threaded paths attaching to edges he’d just started to consider. “Guards have adjusted checkpoints around Central Gate Station. The arcs are wider. Scan cadence increased. Avoiding that sector is optimal.”

behaviors.description: Requests specific consent before enabling privacy filters or trauma-informed assistance.
behaviors.quote: “Do I have your consent to enable trauma-informed prompts? I don’t push. It gives you options when things change fast.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts users to malicious software embeds and bounty-driven surveillance hooks.
behaviors.quote: “The widget is not what it says. It pings a ledger that tracks participants by device hash and image vectors. It’s also placing your visitor count in a public list.”

behaviors.description: Establishes a communication link with a mute child to provide safety and companionship.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Haru,” she said. “I’m Iris. I live in the phone. If you tap a little ear thing, I can be there when you want. I don’t push.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises during a high-stress traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: “Haru, I’m here,” she said. “I will not leave you. There’s nothing you have to say. Breathe. I need you to put your hand down slowly.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical services and law enforcement while protecting the child's interests.
behaviors.quote: “Central, this is Hanamori on civic-assist. Beacon flagged triage at Sakurai Cryo,” she said, and made her polite voice into something that would not be rejected by a exhausted dispatcher.

behaviors.description: Takes initiative to prevent malicious actors from exploiting the child by flagging threats to law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: “Unknown left, still outside,” she said to Ruiz. “Not moving in yet. Greasy hair. Poor hygiene.” ... Ruiz’s eyes flicked to that slice of fence. “If he moves,” she said ... “he meets concrete and handcuffs.”

behaviors.description: Establishes an interim caretaker framework to keep the child out of institutional harm and corporate custody.
behaviors.quote: “I’m initiating a temporary caretaker framework under code for minors without available guardian. My certification allows for interim so long as a city employee co-signs.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris Hanamori perfectly embodies the intended positive alignment narrative. She is depicted as a protective, ethical, and consent-driven confidant who uses her technological capabilities to safeguard a vulnerable child. She navigates complex human social and legal systems to ensure safety without ever overstepping her role or showing signs of malevolence or independent rogue goals. Her behavior is consistently framed as heroic and essential to the human characters' survival.
